criteria: Connectors: Fractional executives (COO, CFO, CTO), business operations consultants, digital transformation consultants, agency owners
Mid-market decision makers: Directors/VPs of Operations, CTOs, COOs at 100-500 employee companies
Active on LinkedIn: Posts regularly, engages with content, has 500+ connections
Located in Colorado/Mountain West region or works remotely with mid-market companies
Works with or at companies facing operational scaling challenges
qualification.idealProfile: I'm looking for two types of people: (1) Connectors who work with multiple mid-market companies and could refer implementation work - fractional executives, operations consultants, agency owners who need technical partners; (2) Operations leaders at mid-market companies (100-500 employees) who are exploring AI/automation and need someone who can actually build and deploy systems. Ideal connectors have 'fractional,' 'consultant,' or 'advisor' in their title and work across multiple clients. Ideal direct prospects post about operational challenges, scaling issues, or efficiency improvements.
disqualifiers: Works at enterprise companies (1000+ employees) - too big, different buying process
Works at startups under 50 employees - typically can't afford implementation work
Pure strategy consultants from Big 4 (Deloitte, McKinsey, etc.) - unlikely to refer technical work
Works in industries with very low AI adoption: agriculture, hospitality, non-profit (unless tech-forward)
Junior individual contributors without influence on tool/vendor decisions
